tsoi.title: Victor Tsoi
tsoi.summary: Soviet singer-songwriter and frontman of Kino, widely regarded as a voice of late-Soviet youth until his tragic passing on August 15, 1990.

yuri.title: Yuri Kasparyan
yuri.summary: Lead guitarist of Kino, known for atmospheric and minimalist post-punk guitar work.

gustav.title: Georgy Guryanov
gustav.summary: Drummer of Kino whose precise, restrained style defined the band’s rhythmic identity.

igor.title: Igor Tikhomirov
igor.summary: Bass guitarist of Kino that joined in 1986, replacing Alexander Titov, becoming part of the band’s classic lineup along with Tsoi, Yuri and Gustav.
